Content: The Nallathanni police states that more than 300,000 people have paid homage at Sripada during last few days. The authorities have taken measures to ensure all the basic amenities for pilgrims who are coming to Sripada. The number of pilgrims arrived in the sacred place increased drastically at the week-end.
